message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its high-quality features and customization options, I believe it would greatly benefit you. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $15000. I am confident it will provide significant value to your business or personal endeavors.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the details you provided about the product. However, $15000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to this price.
